|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [drag(newLoc)](./blockly.dragging_namespace.blockdragstrategy_class.drag_1_method.md) |  | Moves the block and updates any connection previews. |
|  [endDrag(e)](./blockly.dragging_namespace.blockdragstrategy_class.enddrag_1_method.md) |  | Cleans up any state at the end of the drag. Applies any pending connections. |
|  [getSearchRadius()](./blockly.dragging_namespace.blockdragstrategy_class.getsearchradius_1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Get the radius to use when searching for a nearby valid connection. |
|  [isMovable()](./blockly.dragging_namespace.blockdragstrategy_class.ismovable_1_method.md) |  | Returns true if the block is currently movable. False otherwise. |
|  [revertDrag()](./blockly.dragging_namespace.blockdragstrategy_class.revertdrag_1_method.md) |  | Moves the block back to where it was at the beginning of the drag, including reconnecting connections. |
|  [shouldHealStack(e)](./blockly.dragging_namespace.blockdragstrategy_class.shouldhealstack_1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Get whether the drag should act on a single block or a block stack. |
|  [startDrag(e)](./blockly.dragging_namespace.blockdragstrategy_class.startdrag_1_method.md) |  | Handles any setup for starting the drag, including disconnecting the block from any parent blocks. |
